blacklist.message: Sites blocked from appearing in Google search results

blacklistDescription.message: You can use match patterns or regular expressions.

dayjsLocale.description: See https://github.com/iamkun/dayjs/tree/dev/src/locale and select a proper locale.

enableSyncDescription.message: If you enable sync, a file named 'uBlacklist.txt' will be created on your Google Drive and synchronized with your local blacklist.

extensionDescription.message: Blocks specific sites from appearing in Google search results

importBlacklistDescription.message: Paste a domain list exported from Personal Blocklist.

syncWithGoogleDriveEnabled.message: Sync with Google Drive is enabled.

permitDescription.message: You need to sign in to your Google Account and permit this extension to access your Google Drive.
